title: Supplemental Appropriation to the Annual Budget

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.   320__ INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN STEPHEN CONWAY	    	An Ordinance recommended and approved by the Airport Commission and the Board of Estimate and Apportionment authorizing a supplemental appropriation and set apart in the total amount of Four Million Dollars ($4,000,000) from the "Airport Revenue Fund" (established under Ordinance 59286, Section 13, approved October 26, 1984) into the "Annual Budget" (established under authority of Ordinance No. 69432 approved July 1, 2013 for the fiscal year beginning July 1, 2013 and ending June 30, 2014, for current expenses of the government as detailed in EXHIBIT "1" which is attached hereto and incorporated herein; and containing an emergency clause.
